For some reason, it doesnt work :/

If u take the .iso and click Properties, then there's something called Compatibility. Under there, there's a little box saying: Use compatible with. : fx Windows 95. Click that little box and everything should work. If not, then rar the file and use the same technique on the exe files inside and on the installed exe files as well. Then you're at least totally sure.
